skills.name: Pierce Soul
skills.description: Attacks the enemy 2 times to disturb the HP recovery for 2 turns with a 30% chance each. The damage also increases as the enemy's HP decreases.
skills.level_progress_description:
Effect Rate +5%
Effect Rate +5%
Damage +5%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +15%

skill_effect.name: Disturb HP Recovery
skill_effect.description: Healing effects are blocked for a number of turns

skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark>*(-2.0*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Target's HP percentage in range 0 to 1, with 1 being full HP.">Target Current HP %</mark> + 4.0)

skills.name: Brand of Hell
skills.description: Attacks the enemy three times, with each attack having a 50% chance to receive a Branding effect for 2 turns. The damage increases as the enemy's HP becomes lower.
skills.level_progress_description:
Damage +10%
Effect Rate +10%
Damage +10%
Cooltime Turn -1

skill_effect.name: Brand
skill_effect.description: Enemies with Branding Effect take 25% more Damage

skills.multiplier_formula: <mark>ATK</mark>*(-2.2*<mark data-toggle="tooltip" data-placement="top" title="Target's HP percentage in range 0 to 1, with 1 being full HP.">Target Current HP %</mark> + 4.4)

skills.name: Soul Destroyer(Passive)
skills.description: When you defeat an enemy during your turn, the enemy's soul will be destroyed and will prevent the enemy from being resurrected, and will grant you the Soul Protection for 2 turns. [Automatic Effect]

skill_effect.name: Anti-Revive
skill_effect.description: Prevents an enemy from being resurrected after being killed.

skill_effect.name: Auto Effect
skill_effect.description: The skill effect is automatically triggered.

skill_effect.name: Protect Soul
skill_effect.description: If the monster dies with the effect active, it will revive
